ygData.subject: Does Heritrix follows links that are commented out?

Subject: Does Heritrix follows links that are commented out?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=193101426
X-Yahoo-Profile: pm5400845

I have just received the following message, coming from a website that i 
crawled with Heritrix:

I was using the CVS HEAD version (from the continuous build box) ant 
this order.xml:  http://www.net2map.org/order.xml

Hi Your bot crawled my site, however it has a few minor issues that should be
corrected.

Your bot interpreted Java Script commands such as
<script type='text/javascript'>
<!--
writeaddress('tjeerd.de.groot','hccnet','nl');
// -->
</script>
as URLs and was getting a lot of 404 errors (see a small extract from my weblog
below).
[My IP address]	-	-	[07/Mar/2005:01:11:33	+1300]	GET /showall.php
HTTP/1.0	200	124815	-	Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; heritrix
+http://www.net2map.org)
[My IP address]	-	-	[07/Mar/2005:01:16:02	+1300]	GET /tjeerd.de.groot
HTTP/1.0	404	1327	-	Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; heritrix +http://www.net2map.org)
[My IP address]	-	-	[07/Mar/2005:01:19:53	+1300]	GET /fam.legerstee
HTTP/1.0	404	1325	-	Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; heritrix +http://www.net2map.org)
[My IP address]	-	-	[07/Mar/2005:01:23:24	+1300]	GET /terra.com
HTTP/1.0	404	1321	-	Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; heritrix +http://www.net2map.org)


It also tried following links that were commented out.
[My IP address]	-	-	[07/Mar/2005:11:49:19	+1300]	GET /origins.php
HTTP/1.0	200	71208	-	Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; heritrix +http://www.net2map.org)
[My IP address]	-	-	[07/Mar/2005:12:04:43	+1300]	GET /w.gif
HTTP/1.0	404	1317	-	Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; heritrix +http://www.net2map.org)
[My IP address]	-	-	[07/Mar/2005:12:10:41	+1300]	GET /h.gif
HTTP/1.0	404	1317	-	Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; heritrix +http://www.net2map.org)
[My IP address]	-	-	[07/Mar/2005:12:16:08	+1300]	GET /v.gif
HTTP/1.0	404	1317	-	Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; heritrix +http://www.net2map.org)
[My IP address]	-	-	[07/Mar/2005:12:20:59	+1300]	GET /i.gif
HTTP/1.0	404	1317	-	Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; heritrix +http://www.net2map.org)
